description: {"blocks":[{"key":"fdse0","text":"RNA extraction protocol using CTAB method optimized for leaf and bud samples from Shorea curtisii.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":82,"length":16}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2q9do","text":"Adapted from extraction protocol for Shorea beccariana (see attached publication).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":37,"length":18}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
manuscript_citation: Kobayashi MJ, Takeuchi Y, Kenta T, Kume T, Diway B, Shimizu KK. Mass flowering of the tropical tree Shorea beccariana was preceded by expression changes in flowering and drought-responsive genes. Mol Ecol. 2013 Sep;22(18):4767-82. doi: 10.1111/mec.12344. Epub 2013 May 8. PMID: 23651119; PMCID: PMC3817532.

status.info: We use this protocol and it’s working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"9uh4p","text":"Weigh BUD   or LEAF   and transfer into a 1.5 mL tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":10,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":20,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"28ocd","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"23iig","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"40","error":false,"guid":"28EF47F0946511EB9B992FE10DD57124","id":"87522","label":"(25-40 mg)","scientificNotation":false,"unit":5}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"60","error":false,"guid":"BF5F1760946511EB9B992FE10DD57124","id":"87523","label":"(50-70 mg)","scientificNotation":false,"unit":5}}}}
